name: Create film
query: CREATE (Value:Film {primaryTitle: "L'histoire de mon 20 au cours Infrastructure de donnees", startYear: 2026, idFilm: 1})

name: Display film by name
query:
MATCH (f:Film {primaryTitle: "L'histoire de mon 20 au cours Infrastructure de donnees"})
RETURN f

name: Display artist with more than one movies
query:
MATCH (a:Artist)-[:acted_in]->(f:Film)
WITH a, count(f) AS nombre_films
WHERE nombre_films > 1
RETURN a.primaryName, nombre_films

name: Display artist with more than one role
query:
MATCH (a:Artist)-[r]->(f:Film)
WITH a, count(DISTINCT type(r)) AS nombre_roles, collect(DISTINCT type(r)) AS liste_roles
WHERE nombre_roles > 1
RETURN a.primaryName, nombre_roles, liste_roles

name: Artist with more than one role in the same movie
query:
MATCH (a:Artist)-[r]->(f:Film)
WITH a, f, count(DISTINCT type(r)) AS nb_responsabilites, collect(DISTINCT type(r)) AS roles
WHERE nb_responsabilites > 1
RETURN a.primaryName AS Artiste, f.primaryTitle AS Film, roles
ORDER BY nb_responsabilites DESC

name: movie with max number of actor
query:
MATCH (a:Artist)-[:acted_in]->(f:Film)
WITH f, count(DISTINCT a) AS nb_acteurs_uniques
// Etape 1 : Trouver le score maximum
WITH max(nb_acteurs_uniques) AS max_acteurs
// Etape 2 : Retrouver les films qui ont ce score
MATCH (a:Artist)-[:acted_in]->(f:Film)
WITH f, count(DISTINCT a) AS nb_acteurs_uniques, max_acteurs
WHERE nb_acteurs_uniques = max_acteurs
RETURN f.primaryTitle, nb_acteurs_uniques
